page.title: 12Economics
page.content: There are 5 banks in Cowdenbeath High Street: Girobank, TSB , Royal Bank of Scotland (2) and the Bank of Scotland; 3 of which have cashlines. There are also 6 building societies giving Cowdenbeath 11 banking facilities in a space of half a mile. Since people have become very money conscious, there has been a massive increase in banking customers, Cashlines are expecially popular, and causes few problems. These cashline services bring a lot of business to the banks which are making a considerable profit in this area. Building Societies have not introduced cashlines, but do have better opening hours. The building societies do not rely as heavily on computers as the banks do, although the Girobank does not have a computer.
